title: Backbone.Tendon
description: Backbone.Tendon is a small set of moduler objects to quickly get stretching with Backbone (in-development).

title: Northplate
description: Boilerplate code for html projects using SMACSS style moduler CSS definitions using Sass and Compass.

title: Stoplight
description: jQuery plugin for form validation, uses data* attributes to define validation rules.

title: Bobsled
description: Slideshow jQuery plugin for timer based slideshows, compatible with touch devices as well. Used on the Webtrends.com home page.

title: Dropasaur
description: A tiny jQuery plugin for extending drop down and menu behavior.  Also used on Webtrends.com

title: Seperator.js
description: Javascript interface for seperating display and data concerns in small scale projects.
